title: Turn the Page
description: 'Turn the Page' is a poetry collection of a breathtaking range. The author creates flamboyant verses of muse and marvel. It is a prodigy that can lead a reader to self-discovery in the most rhythmic way possible. This collection is a lyrical mastery with no words wasted. It voices the idealism that leaves a reader inspired, moved and elated at the same time.
author: Sayali Paseband
